project.title: [Client Redacted] - Office 365 & Skype for Business Migration

challenge.summary: Migrate on-premises communication systems to cloud platform ensuring zero downtime, enhanced security, and compliance with public sector standards.

solution.summary: Strategic approach to communication systems migration:
deliverables: Data migration using Microsoft native tools
Security and compliance adjustments within Office 365

outcomes: ✅ Enhanced communication capabilities with cloud-based systems
✅ Increased reliability and scalability of services
✅ Secure and compliant environment meeting government standards
✅ Successful cloud transition with zero downtime
✅ Smooth transition with minimal operational disruption
